text: Yei bɛyɛ kyɛfa kronkron ama asɔfoɔ no. Ɛbɛyɛ anammɔn mpem aduasa nson ne ahanum (37,500) ne tentene mu wɔ atifi fam, na ayɛ anammɔn mpem dunum (15,000) wɔ atɔeɛ fam. Ɛbɛyɛ anammɔn mpem dunum (15,000) wɔ apueeɛ fam, na anafoɔ fam nso ɛbɛyɛ anammɔn mpem aduasa nson ne ahanum (37,500). Ne mfimfini bɛyɛ Awurade kronkronbea.
